con:configuration.script:
import static java.util.UUID.randomUUID
uuid = randomUUID() as String uuid = uuid.toUpperCase() return uuid

con:request.name: Create DE - Invalid Name
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">\r <soapenv:Header>\r <fueloauth xmlns="http://exacttarget.com">${Auth#accesstoken}</fueloauth>\r </soapenv:Header>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <CreateRequest xmlns="http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI">\r <Options/>\r <Objects xsi:type="DataExtension">\r <CustomerKey>${Create Random DE Name#DE Name}</CustomerKey>\r <Name><script>alert(1)</script></Name>\r <IsTestable>false</IsTestable>\r <IsSendable>false</IsSendable>\r <SendableDataExtensionField/>\r <Fields>\r <Field> <Name>Subscriber Key</Name> <FieldType>Text</FieldType> <MaxLength>25</MaxLength> <IsPrimaryKey>true</IsPrimaryKey> <IsRequired>true</IsRequired> </Field> <Field> <Name>EmailAddress</Name> <FieldType>EmailAddress</FieldType> <MaxLength>150</MaxLength> <IsRequired>true</IsRequired> </Field> <Field> <Name>First Name</Name> <FieldType>Text</FieldType> <MaxLength>50</MaxLength> <IsRequired>false</IsRequired> </Field> <Field> <Name>Last Name</Name> <FieldType>Text</FieldType> <MaxLength>50</MaxLength> <IsRequired>false</IsRequired> </Field> <Field> <Name>Birthdate</Name> <FieldType>Date</FieldType> <IsRequired>false</IsRequired> </Field> <Field> <Name>Age</Name> <FieldType>Number</FieldType> <IsRequired>false</IsRequired> </Field> <Field> <Name>HTML Email</Name> <FieldType>Boolean</FieldType> <IsRequired>false</IsRequired> </Field> </Fields> </Objects>\r </CreateRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
